definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem

sentences.english: Felton has to be looking over his shoulder after the Bobcats made a strong play for T.
sentences.chinese: 费尔顿得好好思量一下，毕竟夏天山猫向T。

sentences.english: Lynx have longer legs and much broader paws. This helps them charge around in snow.
sentences.chinese: 山猫腿较长，脚掌较宽，协助它们在雪地中冲刺。

sentences.english: The Bobcats forwards also played well.
sentences.chinese: 山猫队前锋发挥的很出色。

sentences.english: Ocelot: An ocelot never lets his prey escape.
sentences.chinese: 山猫从来不会让猎物溜掉的。

sentences.english: Felton sent to the remote one-third, the Bobcats will be re-opened to the poor 6.
sentences.chinese: 费尔顿远端送进三分，山猫重新将分差拉开到6分。

sentences.english: As in, when the Bobcats win a championship.
sentences.chinese: 就像何时山猫队能夺取了总冠军一样。

sentences.english: The cat slowly half-inched his game.
sentences.chinese: 那只山猫悄悄地向猎物靠近。

sentences.english: The Bobcats'defense was no match for Kobe.
sentences.chinese: 山猫队的防守在科比的进攻下不堪一击。

sentences.english: A lynx sits on a snow-covered rock.
sentences.chinese: 一只山猫蹲在白雪覆盖的岩石上。
野山猫通常都是独行侠。

sentences.english: In 2004 the Charlotte Bobcats join the team to reach 30.
sentences.chinese: 2004年的夏洛特山猫队的加入达到30只。

sentences.english: In parts of France and Germany, wildcats and ospreys have re-established their range.
sentences.chinese: 部份法国与德国，山猫与鹗在建立他们的领域。

sentences.english: From product endorser to Charlotte team executive.
sentences.chinese: 从品牌转让人到夏洛特山猫队的老板。

sentences.english: After all, the Bobcats are a team all year round at a loss.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟山猫队是一支常年处于亏损状态的球队。

sentences.english: Each bobcat will use a single method to mark its territory.
sentences.chinese: 每个山猫都会用一种独特的方法把自己的领地标上记。

sentences.english: Or ask the grinning bobcat why he grinned?
sentences.chinese: 或者问过山猫它为何龇牙带笑？

definition: wolverine (Gulo gulo), also named 貂熊[diao1 xiong2]
